input_text: Sylhet er cha bagan dekhe mone holo, ekhane theke jete ichha korche na
output_text: Seeing Sylhet's tea gardens, I don't feel like leaving here

input_text: Cox's Bazar beach hotel booking requires advance payment in taka only
output_text: Cox's Bazar beach hotel booking e advance payment shudhu taka te lagbe

input_text: Dhaka te ferot eshe first e Hajir Biriyani khabo, eta miss korte pari na
output_text: Returning to Dhaka, first I'll eat Hajir Biriyani, can't miss this

input_text: Pathao bike service works faster than CNG through Old Dhaka's narrow lanes
output_text: Puran Dhaka er choto rasta diye Pathao bike CNG er theke fast jay

input_text: Chittagong er fish market theke taza mach kinbo, Dhaka te emon pawa jay na
output_text: Will buy fresh fish from Chittagong's fish market, can't get this quality in Dhaka

input_text: Uber car booking fails during heavy Dhaka monsoon but rickshaw wala still available
output_text: Dhaka er bhorsha brishti te Uber car booking fail hoy kintu rickshaw wala available thake

input_text: Rajshahi te giye mishti mukh korbo, local sweet shop gulo famous
output_text: Going to Rajshahi, will taste sweets, local sweet shops are famous

input_text: Foodpanda delivery reaches even remote areas of Barisal during flood season
output_text: Flood er shomoy o Foodpanda delivery Barisal er dur dur jayga te pohuche

input_text: Rangpur er pitha festival e jabo, winter e etar taste alada
output_text: Will go to Rangpur's pitha festival, its taste is different in winter

input_text: CNG auto rickshaw driver knows shortcuts through every Dhaka neighborhood traffic
output_text: Dhaka er shobai moholla er traffic er moddhe diye CNG driver shortcut jane

input_text: Khulna theke shundarbon tour korbo, boat booking advance e korte hobe
output_text: Will tour Sundarbans from Khulna, boat booking needs to be done in advance

input_text: Mobile network coverage drops completely in remote tea garden areas of Sylhet
output_text: Sylhet er dur dur cha bagan e mobile network coverage bilkul nei

input_text: Rickshaw wala bhai, Puran Dhaka er Shakhari Bazar e jaben?
output_text: Rickshaw driver brother, will you go to Shakhari Bazar in Old Dhaka?

input_text: Hotel room booking confirmation arrives exactly when train reaches Chittagong station
output_text: Train Chittagong station e pouchhe hotel room booking confirmation ashe

input_text: Fuchka wala bhai Dhanmondi te better spice control kore, New Market er theke
output_text: Fuchka vendor brother has better spice control in Dhanmondi than New Market

input_text: Pathao food delivery timing perfectly matches office lunch break in Motijheel
output_text: Motijheel e office lunch break er sathe Pathao food delivery timing perfectly match kore

input_text: Sylhet er cha dokan e boshe pahar dekha jay, Dhaka er pollution nei
output_text: Sitting at Sylhet's tea stall, mountains are visible, no Dhaka pollution

input_text: Cox's Bazar hotel staff learned basic Chittagonian dialect for tourist communication
output_text: Cox's Bazar hotel staff tourist der sathe kotha bolte Chittagonian dialect shikhche

input_text: Barisal er naukay koira fish market jai, CNG auto rickshaw cholbe na okhane
output_text: Going to fish market by boat in Barisal, CNG auto rickshaw won't run there

input_text: Street food tastes completely different in each division but taka price stays similar
output_text: Prottek division e street food er taste alada kintu taka price almost same

input_text: Rangpur er winter e rickshaw chapa khub shokto, gaye blanket diye cholte hoy
output_text: In Rangpur's winter, rickshaw riding is very hard, have to travel wrapped in blankets

input_text: Uber driver refuses trips to remote areas beyond Dhaka metropolitan limits
output_text: Dhaka metropolitan area er baire dur jayga te Uber driver jete chay na

input_text: Khulna er mach bazar e taka count korte giye confuse hoye jabo
output_text: Going to count taka at Khulna's fish market, I'll get confused

input_text: Foodpanda accepts only digital payment but rural tea stalls prefer cash transactions
output_text: Foodpanda shudhu digital payment ney kintu gram er cha dokan cash prefer kore

input_text: Chittagong port e ship dekhte giye mobile er battery shesh, charger nei
output_text: Went to see ships at Chittagong port, mobile battery finished, no charger

input_text: Local rickshaw wala knows every shortcut through Rajshahi's university area traffic
output_text: Rajshahi university area er traffic er moddhe diye local rickshaw wala shob shortcut jane

input_text: Dhaka te fire eshe prothom kemon lagche? Sylhet er theke onek alada
output_text: How does it feel coming back to Dhaka? Very different from Sylhet

input_text: Hotel breakfast menu changes completely based on which division you're visiting
output_text: Kon division e visit korcho tar opor hotel breakfast menu completely change hoy

input_text: CNG auto rickshaw meter cholche na, Barisal e shobshomoy negotiate korte hoy
output_text: CNG auto rickshaw meter isn't working, in Barisal always have to negotiate

input_text: Train journey shesh, finally Dhaka station e neme ghor er dike jabo
output_text: Train journey finished, finally getting off at Dhaka station and heading home
